'''''Tolkien's Great War''''' is a [[2014]] documentary film about the experiences of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his closest friends in the First World War. Made by two former pupils of [[King Edward's School]], Zander and Elliot Weaver, the film-makers interview [[John Garth]], Simon Stacey and Paul Golightly.
